examples.text: The artist used a <w>trichrome</w> palette to create a vibrant and distinct visual style.
Early color photography often relied on a <w>trichrome</w> process to combine separate color channels.

senses.sense_definition: Relating to a scientific staining technique that uses three dyes to distinguish different tissue components.

examples.text: The lab technician prepared a <w>trichrome</w> stain to analyze the muscle fibers.
We used a <w>trichrome</w> method to clearly differentiate the collagen from the surrounding tissue.

senses.sense_definition: A combination of three dyes used in histology to stain different tissue elements in distinct colors.

examples.text: The pathologist examined the sample under the microscope after applying a <w>trichrome</w>.
Masson's <w>trichrome</w> is particularly useful for distinguishing cells from connective tissue.
